resp = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    document={
        "text": "Document with ID 1"
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="2",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "text": "Document with ID 2"
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "terms": {
            "_id": [
                "1",
                "2"
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
